mapper.sql: id, group_code, task_code, task_name, sort, days, day_flag, operators, minutes, score, remarks, status, user_id, user_name, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.group_code,t.task_code,t.task_name,t.sort,t.days,t.day_flag,t.operators,t.minutes,t.score,t.remarks,t.`status`,t.user_id,t.user_name,t.create_time, t1.id_code,t1.code_name, t2.`names` quotationTemplateName, t3.`names` offerInfoName, t4.order_no, t5.company, t6.id operationTeamId, t7.member_user_id memberUserId,t7.memberUserName from waybill_task t LEFT JOIN task_group t1 on t1.id_code = t.group_code AND t1.types=2 LEFT JOIN quotation_template t2 ON t2.task_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN offer_info t3 ON t3.qie = t2.id LEFT JOIN order_info t4 ON t4.offer_info_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN customer t5 ON t5.id = t4.customer_id LEFT JOIN operation_team t6 ON t6.id = t5.operation_team_id LEFT JOIN ( select t.id,t.task_type,t.task_id,t.operation_team_id,t.member_user_id,t.`status`,t.creator,t.creation_time, t1.task_code billTaskCode,t1.task_name billTaskName, t2.task_code waybillTaskCode,t2.task_name waybillTaskName, t3.group_code operationGroupCode,t3.group_name operationGroupName, t4.`name` memberUserName from task_member_relation t LEFT JOIN bill_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id AND t.task_type = 1 LEFT JOIN waybill_task t2 on t2.id = t.task_id AND t.task_type = 2 LEFT JOIN operation_team t3 on t3.id = t.operation_team_id LEFT JOIN system_user t4 on t4.id = t.member_user_id ) t7 ON t7.task_id = t.id AND t7.waybillTaskCode = t.task_code AND t7.waybillTaskName = t.task_name AND t7.operation_team_id = t5.operation_team_id WHERE t3.id = #{offerInfoId} ORDER BY t.sort ASC
